BaseTemplate.description: Starter code for your Nextjs Boilerplate with Tailwind CSS

Index.meta_description: Create and share custom menus effortlessly. With App, your customers can order, and enjoy your offerings with a simple link.

hero.title: Menus made simple
hero.caption:
Easily manage your menu, track orders, and engage customers with QR codes. 
 Improve service and gain valuable insights with our all-in-one platform.

cta.title:
Ready to get started? 
 Sign up today and experience the difference.

cards.name: Digital Menu Editor
cards.description: Easily create and update menus that are accessible via QR codes, ensuring customers always see the latest offerings.

cards.name: Order Management System
cards.description: Streamline order processing and reduce errors with a user-friendly interface that simplifies order tracking and management.

cards.name: Customer Engagement
cards.description: With a unique QR code, your customers can browse and order from your menu seamlessly, and invite friends to join their table, enhancing their dining experience.

cards.name: Reservation Management
cards.description: Allow customers to reserve tables in advance, reducing wait times and ensuring a smooth dining experience.

cards.name: Real-Time Management
cards.description: Visualize table or area occupancy and order status in real-time, allowing staff to efficiently manage tables and service.

cards.name: Analytics and Reporting
cards.description: Gain insights into customer behavior, order patterns, and operational efficiency with detailed analytics and reporting tools.

About.about_paragraph: Welcome to our About page! We are a team of passionate individuals dedicated to creating amazing software.

SignIn.meta_description: Seamlessly sign in to your account with our user-friendly login process.

SignUp.meta_description: Effortlessly create an account through our intuitive sign-up process.
